meta.description: Optimize the cost of meeting daily nutritional requirements using selected food items.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Different food items available for consumption.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams for each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrates content in grams for each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calories provided by each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 93 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 165 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1553 calories are consumed.
